name: The Providence Rink
reviews:
Great place to hang out during cold or hot season.

During wintertime you have the ice bumper cars or the skating.  During the summer you have many...
Need something to do on a Tuesday night?  Stop by and jump in the bumper cars ON ICE!!  Call ahead and make a reservation (who wants to wait in the cold?)...

*Bumper Car review only*

As a visitor to Providence, I wanted to explore things that I couldn't normally do in NY. When I saw the video of the bumper cars...

name: Annmary Brown Memorial
reviews: Recently,I spent two hours enjoying fine paintings at this small,cozy art museum.I especially was captivated by their fine paintings by these American...

It's easy to walk right past this unassuming cement structure, but in doing so, you are missing out on a truly fascinating site. Completed in 1907, this...

name: Pawtucket Wintertime Farmers Market
reviews: This place is amazing and it is one of the best and largest regional farmers markets I've been too. So if you wish to visit, plan to spend several hours in...
Nice wintertime home for this farmers market which is a favorite of mine.  We listened to bluegrass  music while enjoying Brie honey crepes and delicious...
Make sure u get the apples as they are stored in a low oxygen building (which prevents ripening)!  Tastes like freshpicked applles!

name: Bayberry Beer Hall
reviews: Definitely one of the highlights of our quick day trip to Providence! Wide selection of beers and excellent food. We ordered the sourdough pretzel, crispy...

This place has it all... a fine selection of beer and wine, a mouth-watering menu, and a communal...

name: Brass Monkey

If I were a Greek man,

reviews:

name: Museum of Natural History and Planetarium
reviews:
Hi! I have no idea why we haven't ever been here before. $3.00 for the museum and the planetarium. That is the best deal I have ever seen!

The museum is...

name: Slater Memorial Park
reviews:
Wonderful large park with tons of space for parties and walking and biking and kids.  Apparently it's 197 acres of land altogether.

Lots of water to stare...

name: Fête Music Hall

name: Lovecraft Arts & Sciences Council
reviews: Nice place. Really cool staff. They have books, tshirts, movies, and all things Lovecraft. I love it.

name: KG Kitchen Bar

But they charge tax on drinks.

Note to KG: Don't do that.

reviews:

name: Paint and Vino
reviews:

I have the artistic skill of a newborn baby....

name: Parkside Rotisserie & Bar

name: Newport Classic Car Tours
reviews: This is one of the best values and one of the best times we have ever had on a vacation.  Ken is patient, kind, and knowledgeable and the perfect host.  My...

Accommodating, on time, and full of personality! Enjoy the day in one of these awesome cars!

name: Snookers
reviews: This is the go to anytime my work colleagues and I have something down in Providence, mainly because it has a parking lot and if that runs out there's one...

reviews:

name: Barnaby castle

name: The Stable
